name: Grim Fall
description:
Protect your ball from falling from the ledge and killed by grim.. Use some tactics to win the game. This game is all about your focus. This game would increase your focus a lot.

SPEED IS CRITICAL!

WRONG JUMP IS DANGEROUS!

Controls: A or D to move the ball.

Left Shift to use boost.

Stopping at few ledges would help you to save some time to increase boost but remember, ATM you may reduce all your speed.

Hope you will enjoy!
